squidpony.squidutility

Class ProbabilityTable<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidutility.ProbabilityTable<T>

  • @Beta
public class ProbabilityTable<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A generic method of holding a probability table to determine weighted random outcomes. The weights do not need to add up to any particular value, they will be normalized when choosing a random entry.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com

      T random()
      Returns an object randomly based on assigned weights.

    • Method Detail

      • random

        public T random()
        Returns an object randomly based on assigned weights. Returns null if no elements have been put in the table.
        Returns:

      • add

        public void add(T item,
                int weight)
        Adds the given item to the table. Weight must be greater than 0.
